sentence.Network_en: There are two types of relationships between the energy at the two poles : oppositeness and complementation.
sentence.Network_cn: 旋机的两极能量存在两种关系: 对立与互补.

sentence.Network_en: Unity of oppositeness belongs to philosophy and unity of complementation belongs to Daoism.
sentence.Network_cn: 对立统一属于哲学,互补统一属于道学.

sentence.Network_en: The term antonymy is used for oppositeness of meaning, words are opposite in are antonyms.
sentence.Network_cn: 反义关系用以指意义的相反.意义上相反的词叫反义词.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 中文摘要: 反义关系(oppositeness)一直以来就受到了语言学、逻辑学、心理学等学科的关注，这些学科从其自身出发，从不同角度对 …
oppositeness 反义关系, oppositeness 对立性, oppositeness 对立
